backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and logic for voice models, conversion jobs, and profiles with per‑user access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report enumerating implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto‑generated one‑sentence summaries for every frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables and dark mode styles using an OKLCH warm color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing nav, main container, and footer around all pages.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, active state highlighting, logo, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Form component for selecting a voice model, uploading audio, tracking upload progress, and creating a conversion job.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps children with authentication checks, showing a login prompt or loading state if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple component displaying the app’s logo image.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Reusable empty-state layout showing a title, description, optional action, and optional image.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Inline alert component with variants for status messaging using icons and styled alert UI.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and lists all conversion jobs sorted by creation date using JobStatusCard components.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Displays a conversion job’s status, timestamps, and download option for completed jobs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth flow and updates cached data.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Dropdown selector for available voice models, with loading and empty-state handling.
Displays the user's voice models with metadata and deletion controls, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form for uploading a new voice model with metadata, file selection, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, create, and track conversion jobs with automatic refetching for active jobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Provides a lookup function that maps a voice model ID to its display name.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: Defines hooks to fetch, upload, and delete voice models while managing related query cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Page for creating AI covers, showing upload UI or empty state depending on available voice models.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Displays the user's conversion job history or an empty state prompting job creation.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Page for uploading and managing voice models, showing list or empty state accordingly.
Downloads an ExternalBlob as a local audio file using a temporary URL.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File object to a Uint8Array with size validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based query handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the app's custom design.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project metadata, features, image requirements, and current versioned state.
